name: SleepSoundsofWhitenoise&Heartbeats
0:
”Alexa, open peaceful white noise”

skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: peaceful white noise
des:
Let the White noise & Heartbeats sounds clear your mind and take you to a quiet place of reflection.

"Sleep Sounds of White noise & Heartbeats" plays calming sound loops to help you fall asleep faster, sleep better, relax, meditate, or drown out distracting noises.

The vibrations and frequencies of these powerful sounds have shown tremendous healing properties. Just relax and feel the activation of different brain centers as you go deeper with sleep sound.

By default, the sound will play until you stop it. To stop the music, say "Alexa, stop.” To resume it again, say "Alexa, resume."

SHOW YOUR SUPPORT:

Your reviews and feedback are important to us! Please consider showing your support by writing a review for Sleep Sounds, or send us an email with your feedback at support@smartvoicestudio.com.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
